name: admin.users.invite
desc: Invite a user to a workspace.

channel_ids.desc: A comma-separated list of `channel_id`s for this user to join. At least one channel is required.

custom_message.desc: An optional message to send to the user in the invite email.

email.desc: The email address of the person to invite.

email_password_policy_enabled.desc: Allow invited user to sign in via email and password. Only available for Enterprise org teams via admin invite.

guest_expiration_ts.desc: Timestamp when guest account should be disabled. Only include this timestamp if you are inviting a guest user and you want their account to expire on a certain date.

is_restricted.desc: Is this user a multi-channel guest user? (default: false).

is_ultra_restricted.desc: Is this user a single channel guest user? (default: false).

resend.desc: Allow this invite to be resent in the future if a user has not signed up yet. Resending can only be done via the UI and has no expiration. (default: false).

errors.already_in_team: The user is already on the team.
errors.already_in_team_invited_user: The user has already been invited to the team.
errors.failed_looking_up_user: We couldn't find the requested user.
errors.failed_to_validate_caller: The token calling this method doesn't have permission to invite a user.
errors.failed_to_validate_team: The team calling this method was invalid.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.not_an_admin: The user token does not have admin privileges.
